# ChemistryShinyTools Proposal

This document outlines the proposal for `ChemistryShinyTools`, an open-source R package designed to simplify the development of R Shiny applications for cheminformatics research. The project aims to empower chemists and data scientists to create interactive tools for molecular visualization, QSAR modeling, and drug discovery, promoting Râ€™s adoption in the chemistry community.
